## WiPsy in Bayern


```{r libs-hideen}
#| include: false
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
d <- read_csv("data/WiPsy-Bachelor-Bayern-PraÌˆsenz.csv")
```


```{r}
#| eval: false
library(sf)
library(tmap)
bavaria <- read_sf("/Users/sebastiansaueruser/datasets/geo_maps/Bayern/bavaria.shp")

cities <-
  d %>% 
  select(Ort, lat, long) %>% 
  st_as_sf(coords = c("long", "lat"), crs = 4326) %>%
  st_cast("POINT")


p1 <- tm_shape(bavaria) +
  tm_polygons()

p2 <- 
  p1 + 
  tm_shape(cities) +
  tm_dots(size = .1, col = "red")

p2
ggsave(p2, filename = "bayern-wipsy.png", width = 10)
```


```{r}
library(leaflet)

m <- leaflet() %>% 
  addTiles() %>% 
  addMarkers(lng = d$long, lat = d$lat)

m
```
